sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Col, Container, Row } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../App.css' import axios from 'axios' import {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router' const ThirdScreen = ({match}) => { const url = useParams() console.log(url.name,url.title,url.titleId,url.id) const [Detail, setDetail] = useState([]) let countryDetail = null useEffect(() => { const fechData = async() =>{ try { const {data} = await axios.get(`/${url.name}`) const a = Object.keys(data[url.titleId]) var vue = data[url.titleId] countryDetail = vue[`${a[5]}`].find((d)=>d._id === match.params.id ) setDetail(countryDetail) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } fechData() }, []) console.log(Detail.name) return (

{Detail.name}

{Detail.description}

temp 0.C

time 09:45:00
Claud
Air Quality - poor
Wind - 12.45HZ
Wind Gusts 6km/h Know
vhda
scsys
) } export default ThirdScreen
